original_text: Was it not told my lord what I did when Jezebel slew the prophets of the Lord, how I hid an hundred men of the Lord's prophets by fifty in a cave, and fed them with bread and water?
korean_text: 이세벨이 여호와의 선지자들을 죽일 때에 내가 여호와의 선지자 중에 백 명을 오십 명씩 굴에 숨기고 떡과 물로 먹인 일이 내 주에게 들리지 아니하였나이까

sentences.original_text: Was it not told my lord
when Jezebel slew the prophets of the Lord
how I hid an hundred men of the Lord's prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 주의 예언자들 백 명을 어떻게 숨겼는지

sentences.original_text: and fed them with bread and water?
